about_the_game:
Inspired by the accessibility and tactical depth of MOBAs like League of Legends and the expertly-paced tension and vast arenas of battle royale titles like PUBG, League of Survivors brings a bright and engaging cast of heroes into an all-out battle for survival. Developed by a small dev team at Mechanist Games, League of Survivors is a labor of love that we're really excited to bring to a global audience.

Players will face up to 100 opponents either alone or on a team, utilizing all of the resources at their disposal to make it through to the end. The island is set in the eye of a magical storm that forces heroes closer together as the match wears on. And players won't just need to worry about their fellow heroes – the island features a diverse range of monsters that will kill anyone foolish enough to get too close.

The future of Amber is in your hands. All you have to do is survive.

Game Features


  • A gigantic map that supports hundreds of simultaneous players in both solo and team play
  • A growing roster of heroes with a wealth of abilities, tactics, and synergies to discover
  • Powerups and consumable that can change the tide of battle
  • Random loot generation that makes every match unique
  • Tense, well-balanced pacing – League of Survivors rewards tenacity and smart thinking
  • A bright, colorful battlefield set against a rich backstory

  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-core 2.8 GHz or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel/AMD Quad-Core 3.0 GHz or equivalent CPU
